about_the_game:
What modern setting is complete without a store or a restaurant? Now you can enjoy making an elaborate grocery or clothing store, 2 types of restaurants, and a professional kitchen.

Features:
  • Grocery Store Tiles
  • Clothing Store Tiles
  • Two Types Of Restaurants
  • Object Add-Ons
  • A small set of parallax objects so you can stock the shelves yourself and create completely unique store inventories
detailed_description:
What modern setting is complete without a store or a restaurant? Now you can enjoy making an elaborate grocery or clothing store, 2 types of restaurants, and a professional kitchen.

Features:
  • Grocery Store Tiles
  • Clothing Store Tiles
  • Two Types Of Restaurants
  • Object Add-Ons
  • A small set of parallax objects so you can stock the shelves yourself and create completely unique store inventories
